channel.title: Family on The U2F Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Family on The U2F Garden

item.title: Yubikey
item.description: The YubiKey family of authentication tokens is one of the defacto standards in multifactor authentication. All keys in the Yubikey 5 family support FIDO U2F YubiOTP PKCS11 SmartCard & OpenPGP Card interfaces Stored static passwords The Yubikey Nano devices are intended to be stored long-term in a USB port, either in a laptop, dock, or hub and do not support NFC. The 5th generation of devices introduced the Yubikey 5ci, which includes a Lightning connector for use with iOS devices, as well as a USB-C port for desktop use.
